Cover jars tightly; cool to room temperature, about 1 hour.
Refrigerate at least three days before serving.
ee5c4e9487.pred:
In a large bowl, combine the cauliflower, carrots, dill, cilantro, garlic, chilies, habanero, and vinegar.
Cover and refrigerate for 24 hours.
Drain and rinse the vegetables.
In a small bowl, combine the salt, mustard, cumin, and turmeric.
Add the vegetables to a large pot and pour the vinegar over them.
Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
Pour the spice mixture over the vegetables and simmer for 10 minutes.
Remove from the heat and let cool.
Pack the vegetables into clean jars, leaving 1/2 inch headspace.
Process in a boiling water bath for 10 minutes.

6bf369490a.gt:
Stir boiling water into dry gelatin mix in large bowl at least 2 min.
until completely dissolved.
Drain pineapple, reserving juice.
Add enough ice to juice to measure 1-1/2 cups.
Add to gelatin; stir until ice is completely melted.
Refrigerate 45 min.
or until slightly thickened.
Remove 1-1/2 cups of the gelatin; place in medium bowl.
Stir in pineapple; set aside.
Add 1-1/2 cups of the whipped topping to remaining gelatin; stir with wire whisk until well blended.
Pour into 9-inch square dish.
Refrigerate 15 min.
or until set but not firm.
Carefully spoon fruited gelatin over creamy layer in dish.
Refrigerate at least 3 hours or until firm.
Cut into 9 squares.
Serve topped evenly with the remaining whipped topping.
6bf369490a.pred:
In a large bowl, combine boiling water and gelatin mix.
Stir until gelatin is completely dissolved.
Add pineapple and 1/2 cup ice cubes.
Stir until ice is melted.
Add remaining ice cubes and stir until mixture is chilled.
Fold in COOL WHIP.
Pour into 8-inch square pan sprayed with cooking spray.
Refrigerate 3 hours or until firm.
Cut into squares.

163b52a061.gt:
Cut broccoli and cauliflower into smaller pieces.
Heat water in a large wok to boiling and add broccoli and cauliflower.
Let sit for 2-3 minutes, then remove from wok, drain and rinse with cold water.
In same wok, heat 1-2 T oil on high.
Add ginger, garlic, carrot, and green onion.
Cook until garlic starts to turn brown.
Be careful not to overcook!
Add broccoli and cauliflower and stir.
Add sauce, stir, and let simmer for several minutes.
Serve immediately!
163b52a061.pred:
In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat.
Add the broccoli and cauliflower and cook until they are tender-crisp, stirring occasionally.
Add the carrot, garlic, ginger, green onion, oyster sauce, hoisin sauce, soy sauce, and red pepper flakes.
Stir fry for 2 minutes.
Season with salt.

ac5512eda7.gt:
In a bowl, add the egg, sugar, and milk one at a time, mixing well with each addition.
Add the okara and mix well.
Sift the ingredients into the bowl and mix well.
Cook both sides in a covered pan on low heat.
Have it for breakfast or a snack.
Homemade pancake mix pancakes are also yummy.
ac5512eda7.pred:
Preheat a non-stick pan over medium heat.
In a bowl, mix the okara, cake flour, cornstarch, baking powder, baking soda, and eggs.
Add the sugar and milk and mix well.
Pour the batter into the pan and cook until the edges start to brown.
Flip the pancake and cook until the other side is golden brown.
Serve with maple syrup or your favorite topping.

b2af7945d0.gt:
Preheat the oven to 180C.
Put a piece of baking parchment paper on a baking tray.
Spread the pecans out on the baking sheet and pour the maple syrup all over
Cook them for 7 minutes (time it...or hope your sense of smell is good enough to detect when they're done!)
Remove pecans from the oven and set aside.
Combine the buttermilk and mayonnaise in a bowl or jug.
Put the cabbage, carrot and red onion (drained and dried on kitchen paper) in a large mixing bowl.
Season with white pepper.
Serve portions either with or without a few pecans, roughly broken, on top.
b2af7945d0.pred:
Combine all ingredients in a food processor and pulse until cabbage is finely chopped.
Add more mayonnaise if you like.
Serve immediately or cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.

4ca2ec2109.gt:
In a heavy bottomed saucepan, combine the heavy cream, sugar and basil and bring to a simmer.
Remove from heat and let steep for half an hour.
Place this mixture in a blender and puree.
In a large stainless steel bowl place the egg yolks.
Add the half and half mixture while constantly whisking.
Place entire mixture back onto heat.
Add the vanilla bean and the half and half and heat for one to two more minutes, stirring constantly until the mixture has thickened and coats the back of a spoon.
Do not boil!
Remove from heat and strain the entire mixture through a fine mesh sieve.
Cool over an ice bath.
Freeze in an ice cream machine according to manufacturers instructions.
4ca2ec2109.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a medium saucepan, combine the cream, sugar, basil, and egg yolks.
Bring to a simmer over medium heat, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat and let cool.
In a bowl, whisk the half and half until it is warm.
Add the warm cream mixture to the half and half and whisk until smooth.
Add the vanilla bean and seeds.
Pour into an ice cream maker and freeze according to manufacturer's instructions.
When ice cream is done, transfer to a container and freeze until firm.

67ac4adb11.gt:
Preheat your oven to 400 degrees F. Mix sugar, butter, eggs, and vanilla.
Then, stir in flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda, cinnamon, cayenne pepper, and salt.
Form the dough into 1-inch balls.
For coating the cookie dough, mix the sugar and cinnamon.
Coat each dough ball with the mixture.
Place on an ungreased (or use a Silpat) cookie sheet.
Bake 8 to 10 minutes.
Cool 1 minute on the baking sheet, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.
67ac4adb11.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
In a large bowl, cream together the sugar and butter.
Add the eggs and vanilla and beat until smooth.
Combine the flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda, cinnamon, cayenne, and salt.
Add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture and beat until well mixed.
Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto a cookie sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until lightly browned.
Cool on wire racks.

4a4f70b53b.gt:
Spray skillet.
Heat it over medium heat.
Add potatoes and brown lightly.
Set aside.
Season chops with powders and pepper.
Put a little oil in skillet.
Cook chops for one minute on each side.
Drain fat if necessary.
Add water.
Cover and cook for 10 minutes.
Add potatoes and mushroom.
Cook for 10 more minutes.
Stir in sour cream.
Heat thoroughly, but don't boil.
4a4f70b53b.pred:
In a large skillet, heat oil over medium heat.
Add pork chops and cook until browned on both sides, about 3 minutes per side.
Remove pork chops from skillet and set aside.
Add mushrooms and cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and onion powders, pepper, and cook for 1 minute.
Add water and bring to a boil.
Add sour cream and stir until smooth.
Return pork chops to skillet and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve over potatoes.

7ee62fccb3.gt:
Combine all of the ingredients in a pot and stir to coat the carrots evenly.
Set over a medium heat and cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until tender.
7ee62fccb3.pred:
In a large saucepan, bring the carrots, water, butter, honey, cardamom and fennel seeds to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
Remove from heat and add salt and pepper.
Let cool and serve.

0118ce719d.gt:
Toast your bread, butter it but not too much so its not soggy, put your seasonings on and dice into bite size pieces and you now have emergency croutons!
:)
0118ce719d.pred:
Mix all ingredients together and spread on top of bread.
Bake in oven at 350 degrees for 10 minutes.

33a5002bf8.gt:
For carne asada:.
Marinate meat, then prepare ingredients for dressing, before grilling meat.
Plan to have flatbread warmed as you are ready to serve meat.
Marinate steaks in lime juice in a shallow glass dish for 1 minute.
Next add garlic, crushed red chile, black pepper, and Mexican oregano.
Marinate in refrigerator for at least 20 but no longer than 40 minutes.
While marinating meat:.
Combine all ingredients for Jalapeno Ranch Dressing in a 1 cup dish.
Mix well and refrigerate to let flavors blend.
Preheat oven to 170 degrees (or lowest heat setting).
Grill meat to desired doneness
Remove steaks from grill and let "rest" for 5 minutes.
Before meat is about to be taken off grill or while it is resting, add 1/3-1/2 cup of cheese on each flatbread.
Lay the cheese covered flatbreads directly onto middle oven rack and warm until cheese is melted.
Once meat has rested, cut meat against the grain into thin strips.
On each flatbread add desired amount of meat, 1-2 tablespoons jalapeno ranch dressing and about 1 T french fried onion strings.
Enjoy!
33a5002bf8.pred:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.
Cut steak into strips.
Combine lime juice, garlic powder, red pepper flakes, black pepper, and oregano in a shallow dish.
Add steak to marinade and toss to coat.
Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Remove steak from marinade and pat dry.
Place steak on a baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes.
While steak is cooking, prepare sauce.
Mix mayonnaise, sour cream, buttermilk ranch salad dressing mix, jalapeno peppers, and jalapeno juice in a small bowl.
Set aside.
Remove steak from oven and let cool slightly.
Place on a platter and top with sauce.
Garnish with cilantro.
Serve with flat bread and cheese.

9b2eec25f7.gt:
Wash the cabbage well, remove the core, and chop roughly.
Try to use very fresh, raw beef offal!
Blanch the beef offal by dipping it in boiling water and then putting it in ice water.
Cut the Chinese chives into 5 cm pieces.
Remove the center of the garlic and slice the cloves.
Cut the grilled tofu into 12 equal pieces.
Remove the seeds from the red chili pepper.
Add all ingredients except for the Chinese chives and sesame oil.
Simmer and skim off scum.
If using chicken stock, add 1.5 tablespoons now.
When the cabbage is cooked, add the Chinese chives and the sesame oil.
Cutting the red chili pepper into very fine pieces will increase the spiciness.
As soon as the Chinese chives are heated, sprinkle on the sesame seeds and it's all done!
Eat with the soup and enjoy!
Make ramen for the "shime" at the end of the meal.
Cook fresh noodles in boiling water for 1 minute and then add to the hot pot soup.
Simmer for 3 minutes and the noodles are done.
Refer tofor the chicken stock.
9b2eec25f7.pred:
In a large pot, combine the beef offal, cabbage, chives, tofu, sesame oil, sesame seeds, garlic, chicken stock, soy sauce, mirin, sugar, and chili pepper.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to a simmer and cook for 1 hour.
Serve over ramen or chanpon noodles.

6976afc901.gt:
Cook Brussels sprouts in large saucepan of boiling water 10 to 12 min.
or until tender, adding cranberries to the cooking water for the last minute.
Drain Brussels sprouts mixture; return to pan.
Add dressing; toss to evenly coat.
6976afc901.pred:
Bring a large pot of water to a boil.
Add the Brussels sprouts and cook for 3 minutes.
Drain and rinse with cold water.
Place the Brussels sprouts in a large bowl of ice water.
Drain and pat dry.
Place the Brussels sprouts in a large bowl.
Add the cranberries and dressing.
Toss to coat.
Serve immediately.

30325f1814.gt:
Beans: trim and remove strings if you choose, then wash them.
Cook beans until they are crisp-tender.
Drain and set aside.
Cook bacon and reserve fat.
In a deep pan or pot, add olive oil.
Once hot, add the onion and saute for a little bit.
Now add garlic and simmer until the onions are clear.
Add the mushrooms, red bell pepper and parsley.
After 5 minutes of simmering, add cooking wine, chicken broth and some of the reserved bacon fat.
Cook until desired taste or when some of the liquid steams away.
Add salt to taste.
Remove liquid mixture from the stove, add the string beans, almonds and crumbled bacon.
Mix well and put in a serving dish.
Enjoy!
30325f1814.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium heat until crisp.
Reserve 1 tablespoon of bacon fat.
Add olive oil and onion to the skillet and cook until onion is soft.
Add garlic and mushrooms and cook until mushrooms are tender.
Add green beans and cook until beans are crisp-tender.
Add red bell pepper and cook until pepper is tender.
Stir in parsley and white cooking wine.
Season with salt and pepper.
Transfer to a 9x13-inch baking dish.
Sprinkle with almonds and drizzle with reserved bacon fat.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Serve warm.

abf7924ee4.gt:
Start by heating olive oil in a skillet over high heat.
When the pan is pretty hot, add the garlic and cook for 1 minute literally.
You dont want the garlic to burn.
We used 3 cloves of garlic, but we probably should have used 4.
I love that stuff!
Add the butter and stir to melt.
Then add the heavy cream.
Stir well and heat for 5 minutes.
Add the flour.
This will help thicken the sauce.
Although corn starch could be used instead, I tend to stay away from that unless I absolutely need to use it.
Bring to a boil and then reduce the heat to simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Then add the salt and pepper.
We used more pepper than salt, but thats entirely up to you.
Add the ground nutmeg, and stir.
At the end of the process, add the grated cheese, stir and then add in the parsley, which will add some green and liven up the dish.
Serve with pasta (we used tortellini) and enjoy!
abf7924ee4.pred:
In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
Add the garlic and cook, stirring constantly, until the garlic is lightly browned.
Add the butter and cook, stirring, until the butter is melted.
Add the heavy cream and flour and stir until smooth.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Add the nutmeg and Parmesan cheese.
Stir until the cheese is melted.
Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add the parsley and cook for 1 minute.
Serve over pasta or rice.

14273bf5f9.gt:
Trim most of fat from pork loin, and place in crock pot, fat side up.
Sprinkle with garlic powder, pepper, salt, and red pepper flakes.
Top with onion.
Cook on high for 45-60 minutes.
Switch to low.
Cook on low for about 4 1/2 hours.
Mix all sauce ingredients together.
Separate pork loin into big chunks.
Pour sauce mixture into crock pot, making sure to mix in juices from pork loin.
Cook for one more hour, then shred pork with two forks.
Barbecue can be left simmering for another 2 hours on low, or switched to"keep warm" setting instead.
Serve on buns.
14273bf5f9.pred:
In a crock pot, combine the pork loin, garlic powder, black pepper, salt, red pepper flakes, onion, ketchup, tomato sauce, garlic powder, brown sugar, honey, Worcestershire sauce, smoky-style barbecue sauce, vinegar, black pepper, and cayenne pepper.
Cook on low for 8 hours.
Serve with buns.

d5926ad471.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 F. Lightly grease and flour a pie dish.
Rub the seasoning on the chicken breasts.
Place in a medium saucepan and add enough water to cover.
Bring to a simmer and cook over medium heat for 10 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through.
Drain and dice chicken.
In a large bowl, combine chicken, cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, mixed vegetables, and salt and pepper.
Mix thoroughly.
Lay one sheet of pastry in the bottom of the greased and floured pan.
Pour chicken mixture over pastry.
Cover with second sheet of pastry.
Seal edges of the top and bottom pastries by pinching them together.
Cut steam vents in the top crust.
Bake in preheated oven for 50 minutes, until pastry is golden brown.
d5926ad471.pred:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.
Mix chicken, soup, cheese, vegetables, salt and pepper in a large bowl.
Pour into pie crusts.
Bake for 20 minutes or until crust is golden brown.

133d9c352d.gt:
If berries are frozen, slightly thaw.
In a bowl, stir together sugar and flour.
Add fruit to sugar mixture, tosing well and spread mixture into baking dish.
Preheat oven to 375.
Topping:
Coarsely chop pistachios.
In a bowl, mix the flour and sugars.
Cut the butter into cubes with your fingers or a pastry blender, blending the flour mixture until it resembles coarse meal.
Add pistachios and toss well.
Squeeze a handful of topping together and coarsely crumble in chunks over filling.
Squeeze and evenly crumble remaining topping over filling in same manner.
Bake crisp in oven until filling is bubbling and topping is crisp and golden, about 50 minutes.
(can be done in advance).
Just before serving, heat crisp in 300 oven for 20 - 30 minutes until just warm.
Serve with ice cream or frozen yogurt.
Note: When measuring out the fruit.
I just add the blueberries and enough rhubarb to the baking dish, taking in to allowance the shrinkage of cooking.
If no rhubarb is available, just use all blueberries.
133d9c352d.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Mix together sugar and flour.
Add rhubarb and blueberries.
Pour into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Sprinkle pistachios over the top.
Combine flour, sugar, brown sugar and butter.
Mix well and pat over the fruit.
Bake for 45 minutes.

fa8f24e9ab.gt:
Stir together dry ingredients.
Mix liquids and fruit or nuts together and add to dry mixture, stirring lightly.
Fill 6 oiled muffin tins 1/2 full and bake 15 minutes at 425 degrees F.
fa8f24e9ab.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Mix all ingredients together.
Pour into greased muffin tins.
Bake for 20 minutes.

b9b1d42894.gt:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Pour mixture over chicken in slow cooker.
Cook 3-4 hours on low.
Serve with no-yolk egg noodles.
Number of Servings: 4.
b9b1d42894.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
In a large skillet, cook bacon bits until crisp.
Drain on paper towels.
In a large bowl, combine bacon bits, garlic, ranch dressing mix, and cream of chicken soup.
Stir until well blended.
Place chicken breasts in a slow cooker.
Pour bacon mixture over chicken.
Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours.
Remove chicken from slow cooker.
Shred with two forks.
Return chicken to slow cooker.
Cover and cook on high for 15-20 minutes or until heated through.
Serve with rice or noodles.

ed047c7fd8.gt:
Add the milk, and small pieces of torn up cheese into a small saucepan.
Heat it up over medium-low heat until right before it starts to boil.
When the cheese has melted, mix well with a wooden spatula.
Let the mixture cool down.
Separate the egg yolks and egg whites.
Add the egg whites, 1/2 of the sugar into a bowl, and whip into a firm meringue.
Add the egg yolks and the remaining sugar into a separate bowl, and mix with a whisk.
Add the Step 1 mixture, and mix well.
Sift the cake flour into the Step 4 bowl, and mix well with the whisk.
Add the lemon juice as well, and mix well.
Add 1/3 of the Step 3 meringue into the Step 5 bowl, and mix well with the whisk.
Add the remaining meringue, and mix well with a spatula.
Pour the batter into a cake pan lined with parchment paper.
Place it in a baking sheet filled with hot water in the preheated oven, and bake for about 50 minutes at 160C.
Cover with aluminium foil halfway through so that it won't get burned.
If you don't mix the mixture really well during Step 6, it will separate into 2 layers, so please be careful.
If you are using a cake pan with removable bottom, the hot water will come into the pan while steam-baking in a water bath during Step 8, so please cover the bottom with aluminium foil and bake.
ed047c7fd8.pred:
Preheat oven to 180C.
Melt cheese in a saucepan over low heat.
Beat eggs and sugar in a bowl with an electric mixer until thick and pale.
Add the melted cheese and milk to the egg mixture and mix well.
Pour into a greased 20cm springform pan.
Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.
Remove from oven and allow to cool completely.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours.
To serve, remove the side of the springform pan and cut into slices.

07d9e9cc9b.gt:
Combine water, sugar, salt, yeast, oil, and enough flour to make a soft dough.
(You may need more than 3 1/2 cups.)
Knead for 3-4 minutes.
On a greased counter, break off pieces of dough and roll into thin ropes that are about 1 1/2 times the length of your skewers.
Twist the rope around the skewer and place on a greased cookie sheet.
Repeat till all dough is used.
Let twists rise till doubled, about 30 minutes.
While they are baking, combine the glaze ingredients and let site while the bread twists bake so the flavors will blend.
Bake twists at 375F for about 12-15 minutes or till golden brown.
Remove from oven and brush with the butter glaze.
Try not to drool.
07d9e9cc9b.pred:
Mix all ingredients together and knead into a soft dough.
Let rise for 1 hour.
Divide dough into 12 pieces.
Roll each piece into a rope.
Twist each rope into a spiral.
Place on a greased cookie sheet.
Let rise for 30 minutes.
Bake at 375 degrees for 20 minutes.

4bdae5bcc7.gt:
Heat the leftover minestrone.
Add water, salt, pepper and consomme if there isn't enough.
Add rice and a lot of parmesan cheese, mix, and it is done.
For a minestrone recipe, check out.
4bdae5bcc7.pred:
Heat the water in a saucepan and add the rice, salt and pepper.
Cook until the rice is tender, about 20 minutes.
Add the leftover minestrone and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add the Parmesan cheese and stir until melted.
Serve immediately.

baa571bacd.gt:
Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 400F.
Drain 1 can tomatoes, reserving juice, then break up tomatoes into 1/2-inch pieces with a spoon if necessary; puree the second can of tomatoes,including juice and reserved juice (from other can), 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/8 teaspoon allspice in a blender OR use hand blender, until smooth.
Transfer tomato puree to a 2-quart heavy saucepan and boil uncovered, stirring occasionally, until reduced to about 1/2 cup, about 20 minutes, remove from heat.
Heat a dry 12-inch heavy skillet over moderate heat until hot, then brown lamb with 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, and remaining 1/2 teaspoon allspice, stirring and breaking up lumps (but leaving meat slightly chunky), about 5 minutes; add drained tomatoes and cook, stirring occasionally, until juices are absorbed, about 1 minute.
Cut polenta into 1/4-inch-thick slices with a sharp knife and cover bottom of a 9-inch glass pie plate with half of polenta slices (overlapping slightly); scatter half of lamb mixture over polenta, then top with half of mozzarella, then remaining polenta; scatter remaining lamb on top and spread tomato sauce over meat, then top with remaining mozzarella.
Bake, uncovered, until bubbling and beginning to brown, about 20 minutes; let stand, loosely covered with foil, 15 minutes before serving, Enjoy.
baa571bacd.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large bowl, combine the polenta, 1/2 cup of the milk, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
Stir in the remaining milk, 1/2 cup at a time, until the polenta is smooth and creamy.
Set aside.
In a large skillet, brown the lamb and onion over medium heat.
Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Stir in the tomatoes, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 1 hour.
Stir in the ground allspice.
In a 13 x 9-inch baking dish, spread 1 cup of the polenta mixture.
Arrange 3 lasagna noodles on top of the polenta.
Spread 1/2 cup of the meat sauce over the noodles.
Sprinkle 1/2 cup of the mozzarella over the sauce.
Repeat the layers twice.
Top with the remaining polenta mixture.
Bake for 30 minutes.
Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.

b8672866a8.gt:
Whisk together vinegar, a rounded 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/8 teaspoon pepper in a small bowl, then add oil in a slow stream, whisking well.
Put spinach, strawberries, and pecans in a large bowl and toss with just enough vinaigrette to lightly coat.
b8672866a8.pred:
In a large bowl, combine the spinach, strawberries, and pecans.
In a small bowl, whisk together the strawberry vinegar and olive oil.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to coat.
Serve immediately.

9af737b60b.gt:
Blend all ingredients in blender on high speed until smooth.
Serve immediately.
9af737b60b.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a glass and enjoy!

817c37fbf2.gt:
1.
Line a 9-inch round cake pan with parchment paper and preheat the oven to 350 F/177 C. 2.
Combine water and 1/2 cup of the sugar and bring to a boil in a saucepan over medium heat.
When it hits a boil remove from the heat, add chocolate and stir until the chocolate is completely melted.
Stir in the butter until melted.
Let the mixture cool for about 10 minutes.
3.
Meanwhile, in a large mixing bowl using a whisk attachment, whip the eggs, the remaining sugar, and vanilla extract until is has reached maximum volume.
This process should take about 10 minutes.
4.
Gently fold the chocolate into the egg mixture.
5.
Pour into prepared cake pan and bake for 30 minutes, or until a knife inserted comes out clean.
Remove pan from oven and set on a rack.
6.
Cool then wrap in plastic wrap (with the cake still in the pan) and refrigerate overnight so its easier to work with for decorating.
817c37fbf2.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Grease and flour a 9-inch round cake pan.
In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt.
In a large bowl, using an electric mixer, beat the sugar and butter until light and fluffy.
Beat in the eggs, one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
With the mixer on low, slowly add the flour mixture, alternating with the water.
Pour the batter into the prepared pan.
Bake for 30 to 35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Cool the cake in the pan on a wire rack for 10 minutes, then turn it out onto the rack to cool completely.
For the frosting, in a medium bowl, using an electric mixer, beat the butter until creamy.
Add the chocolate and beat until smooth.
Add the sugar and beat until fluffy.
Add the vanilla and beat until combined.
Frost the cake and serve.

d1c38e95f4.gt:
Note: You will also need a Babycakes cake pop machine.
For the donuts: Preheat your Babycakes cake pop machine.
In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt.
Then add eggs, maple syrup, and vanilla.
Mix well.
Before adding apple pie filling, run a knife through the large chunks of apples to chop them into smaller pieces.
Then add to mixture and mix until all apples are incorporated.
Then add the milk.
The mixture will be on the thick side.
Pour 1 tablespoon of donut mixture into each reservoir of your preheated Babycakes cake pop machine.
Bake for 4 minutes, then remove and place on a plate or cooling rack to cool off.
For the glaze: In a small bowl mix together powdered sugar, vanilla, and milk.
You want the consistency to be runny, not thick.
Dip each donut in the mixture and flip it around by hand or with a fork until the whole donut is covered.
Then place back on the cooling rack until the glaze is dry.
For the coating: In a small bowl combine the powdered sugar and cinnamon.
Dip each donut into the mixture and roll around until all covered.
Then place finished donuts in an airtight container until ready to eat.
Oh, who are you kidding, go ahead and start eating!
d1c38e95f4.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large bowl, combine the flour, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, maple syrup, vanilla, and milk.
Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
Add the apple pie filling and mix until the dough is evenly moistened.
Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and roll out to 1/4 inch thickness.
Cut out donut holes using a 2 1/2 inch round cookie cutter.
Place the donut holes on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake for 10 minutes or until the donut holes are golden brown.
Remove from the oven and cool on a wire rack.
For the glaze, combine the powdered sugar, milk, and cinnamon in a small bowl.
Drizzle the glaze over the donut holes and serve.

57bca3c7cb.gt:
In a small sauce pot, start heating the milk.
Once warm, add Nutella and whisk together until smooth.
Add cocoa, cinnamon, vanilla and salt.
Whisk and cook until it starts to boil.
Pour into mugs and top with LOTS of marshmallows.
57bca3c7cb.pred:
In a saucepan, combine milk, Nutella, cocoa, cinnamon, vanilla, salt, and marshmallows.
Heat over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the marshmallows have melted and the mixture is smooth.
Remove from heat and serve immediately.
Garnish with marshmallows.

02a2ef367b.gt:
Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat, about 6 min.
Add spices, cook an additional 1 min.
Add onions, dressing, and garlic; cook 3 min.
Pour in tomatoes; simmer 5 to 6 min., stirring occasionally or until slightly thickened.
02a2ef367b.pred:
Heat oven to 350F (180C).
Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the beef and cook until browned, about 5 minutes.
Drain off any excess fat.
Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Add the chili powder and cumin and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Add the tomatoes, tomato sauce, and Italian dressing.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper, to taste.
Transfer to a 9x13-inch baking dish and bake until hot and bubbly, about 20 minutes.
Serve with warm tortillas.

9f82ffde67.gt:
In a large saucepan, combine the water, shallots, garlic, thyme, peppercorns, kosher salt and oil.
Squeeze the lemon over the saucepan and add to the pan.
Bring to a boil, then simmer for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, in a microwave-safe bowl, mix the sugar and vinegar and microwave at high power for 1 minute; stir to dissolve the sugar.
Add a pinch of crushed red pepper and the green papaya.
Season with sea salt and black pepper and toss to coat.
In a small bowl, mash the lime juice into the avocado and season with sea salt and crushed red pepper.
Place the halibut in a deep, medium skillet, leaving some space between the fillets.
Strain enough of the aromatic poaching liquid over the fish to just cover it.
Simmer the halibut gently over very low heat just until the fish flakes easily with a fork, about 10 minutes.
Spoon the mashed avocado onto 4 plates and top with the halibut.
Using a slotted spoon, mound the papaya slaw on the fish and serve right away.
9f82ffde67.pred:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
In a large saucepan, bring the water to a boil.
Add the shallots, garlic, thyme, peppercorns, salt, and olive oil.
Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add the lemon juice and sugar.
Simmer for 5 minutes longer.
Remove from heat and let cool.
In a food processor, puree the avocado until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper.
In a large bowl, toss the green papaya with the rice vinegar, red pepper, and salt and pepper.
In a large baking dish, place the fish and pour the cooled sauce over the top.
Bake for 15 minutes, or until the fish is cooked through.
Serve with the avocado mash and green papaya slaw.

6cd8583372.gt:
Simmer all ingredients in covered saucepan over low heat 20 minutes.
Strain out solids before serving.
6cd8583372.pred:
In a large saucepan, combine apple cider, quince, sugar, cinnamon stick, and cloves.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
Remove cinnamon stick and cloves.
Stir in nutmeg.
Serve hot.

8afb640d04.gt:
Wash the sweet potato.
Bake the wet sweet potato in a toaster oven for 10 minutes.
Turn it 90 degrees, and bake for another 10 minutes.
You can also boil or microwave.
Mash the sweet potato with a masher.
Add katakuriko, and water, and knead briefly.
Preheat the oven to 180C / 350F, and set the baking time for 15 minutes.
In the meantime, roll the dough into bite-size balls, and lay on a sheet of parchment paper.
Bake in the oven for 15 minutes at 180C / 350F, then it's done.
8afb640d04.pred:
1.
Preheat oven to 180C.
2.
Peel and boil the sweet potato until soft.
3.
Mash the sweet potato with a fork.
4.
Add the katakuriko and water to the sweet potato.
5.
Mix well.
6.
Form the mixture into 10 balls.
7.
Place the balls on a baking tray and bake for 15 minutes.
8.
Serve warm.

e6bbcbeb0b.gt:
Preheat oven to 425 degrees.
Pat potatoes dry with paper towels.
Toss potatoes and mushrooms with 21/2 tbs oil, 2 tbs cheese, 2 tsp garlic and 2 tsp rosemary, 1/2 tsp salt and 1/4 tsp pepper.
Arrange in 13x9 baking dish in one layer.
Top with remaining 2tbs cheese and bake 15 minute or until potatoes are just lightly browned.
Meanwhile, heat remaining 11/2 tbs oil in large nonstick skillet over med.
heat.
Add chicken pieces.
Season lightly with S&P, sprinkle with remaining rosemary and garlic.
Cook 5-6 minutes on each side or until browned.
(don't crowd pan, may need to do more than one batch).
Arrange chicken pieces on top of potatoes.
Drizzle with any oil from skillet and return to oven.
Bake 20-25 minute longer or until chicken is done.
e6bbcbeb0b.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Place potatoes in a large baking dish and toss with 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon pepper.
Place chicken in a large baking dish and toss with 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon pepper.
Place mushrooms in a large baking dish and toss with 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon pepper.
Roast potatoes, chicken and mushrooms in the oven until golden brown, about 45 minutes.
Remove from oven and sprinkle with 1 tablespoon parmesan cheese.
Return to oven and continue to roast until potatoes are tender, about 15 minutes.
Remove from oven and sprinkle with 1 tablespoon parmesan cheese.
Sprinkle with 1/2 teaspoon garlic and 1/2 teaspoon rosemary.
Return to oven and continue to roast until chicken is cooked through, about 15 minutes.
Remove from oven and serve.

13260b1790.gt:
In a large skillet over medium heat heat the oil.
Add the next 4 ingredients (onion - garlic), cover and cook for 5 minutes or until vegetables are softened.
Transfer vegetables to crockpot.
Add next 7 ingredients (vegetable broth - pepper).
Cover and cook on low for 8 hours.
Stir in Tabasco and liquid smoke.
Divide rice into soup bowls and top with gumbo.
13260b1790.pred:
In a large, heavy-bottomed pot, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Add onion, celery, and green chili pepper.
Cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and cook, stirring, for 1 minute.
Add vegetable broth, tomato juice, tomatoes, and rice.
Stir to combine.
Cover and cook on low heat for 10 minutes.
Add zucchini and thyme.
Cover and cook for 10 minutes more, or until zucchini is tender.
Season with salt and pepper.
Remove from heat and stir in liquid smoke.
Serve hot.

98695d84fe.gt:
Heat broiler.
Using a sharp knife, lightly score eggplant flesh in a criss-cross pattern.
Arrange the eggplant skin side up in a single layer on a non-stick broiler pan.
Lightly brush with half the oil; broil 4 inches away from heat source for 3 minutes or until dimpled but not charred.
Meanwhile, in a small bowl combine soy sauce, sugar and mirin.
Turn eggplant slices over and brush with remaining oil; broil 1 minute.
Brush with soy sauce mixture; broil 1 more minute more until eggplant is tender when it's pierced with a knife.
Sprinkle with scallions before serving.
98695d84fe.pred:
In a large nonstick skillet, heat 2 teaspoons of the olive oil over medium-high heat.
Add the eggplant halves and cook, turning once, until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes.
Transfer the eggplant to a plate.
Heat the remaining 2 teaspoons of olive oil in the skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the scallions and cook, stirring, until softened, about 1 minute.
Add the teriyaki sauce and cook, stirring, until the sauce is reduced by half, about 2 minutes.
Return the eggplant to the skillet and toss to coat with the sauce.
Transfer to a serving dish and serve.

b53489fe80.gt:
Pre heat oven to 180c/350F.
Grease a 6" cake tin or 1 lb loaf tin, and line with greaseproof paper.
Rub the butter into the flour so that it looks like breadcrumbs.
Add the sugar, ground nuts, chopped nuts, dates and the spice.
Mix well.
Add the egg and milk stir with a spoon, do not beat the mixture.
Transfer the mixture to the tin and top with a few nuts.
Bake for 1.5 hour or until a tooth pick inserted into the centre comes out clean.
Allow to cool in the tin for 10 mins and place on a wire rack.
When cool peel off the paper.
b53489fe80.pred:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Grease and flour a 9 inch round cake pan.
In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Beat in the egg, then stir in the sifted flour, mixed spice, and walnuts.
Stir in the dates and walnuts.
Pour into the prepared pan and bake for 45 minutes or until a skewer inserted in the centre comes out clean.
Cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack to cool completely.

9c8b451253.gt:
Combine the potatoes, tomato, carrot, onion, and bay leaves in a slow cooker.
Place the chicken breasts atop the vegetables.
Stir the tomato sauce, chicken broth, and Italian seasoning in a bowl; pour over the chicken breasts.
Add water as needed to assure the chicken is completely covered.
Cook on Low for 6 hours.
Remove the chicken breasts and cut into bite sized chunks and return to slow cooker.
Continue cooking until the vegetables are tender, another 1 to 2 hours.
9c8b451253.pred:
In a large skillet, saute the onion in 1 tablespoon of olive oil until tender.
Add the chicken and cook until no longer pink.
Remove chicken from skillet and set aside.
Add the potatoes, carrots, and tomatoes to the skillet and cook until the vegetables are tender.
Add the tomato sauce, chicken broth, Italian seasoning, red pepper flakes, and water.
Stir well and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add the chicken back to the skillet and simmer for 10 minutes more.

df8f764b0d.gt:
Sprinkle the patties with salt and pepper and grill the hamburgers; Transfer the patties to a warmed platter and start the eggs.
Heat 4 teaspoons of butter in a skillet and carefully break the eggs and cook them sunny side up until the whites are firm.
Remove from the skillet and place one egg on each pattie.
Sprinkle the eggs with salt and pepper;.
Arrange the anchovies (if desired) on top of the eggs.
Heat 4 tablespoons in a skillet; When it gets foamy, add the capers and parsley.
When the butter just starts to brown, pour equal amounts of the sauce over each egg/pattie and serve hot.
df8f764b0d.pred:
Heat grill to medium-high heat.
Place patties on grill and cook 4 minutes on each side.
Remove patties from grill and place on a plate.
Top each patty with 1 egg.
Place patties back on grill and cook until egg is set, 30 seconds to 1 minute.
Remove from grill and serve.

30b0b061b3.gt:
Combine all ingredients together.
Whisk.
Variations; Roasted bell peppers, roasted or creamed garlic, mirin, sambal oelek, lime, lemongrass, ginger, lemon, tomato, horseradish, rice vinegar, shallots, sake, habanero
30b0b061b3.pred:
Mix sriracha, mayonnaise and sesame oil.
Spread on a sheet of plastic wrap.
Cover with another sheet of plastic wrap.
Refrigerate for 1 hour.
Spread onto sushi rice.
Serve.

8ffd977e2f.gt:
In 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat, heat Italian sausages and 1/4 cup water to boiling.
Reduce heat to low; cover and simmer 5 minutes.
Remove cover and cook until sausages are browned, about 15 minutes.
Remove sausages to cutting board.
When cool enough to handle, cut diagonally into 1/4-inch-thick slices.
While sausages are cooking, cut eggplant into 1/2-inch chunks.
In drippings remaining in skillet, over medium heat, cook eggplant and 2 tablespoons water until eggplant is tender, about 15 minutes, stirring often and adding additional water if necessary to keep eggplant from sticking.
Add spaghetti sauce and sausages; over high heat, heat to boiling.
Reduce heat to low; cover and simmer 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, in saucepot, prepare ziti macaroni as label directs but do not use salt in water.
Drain ziti; return to saucepot.
Add spaghetti-sauce mixture; over medium heat, heat through.
To serve, spoon ziti into 8 individual pasta bowls or dinner plates; top each serving with some ricotta cheese and cracked pepper.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese if you like.
8ffd977e2f.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Cook pasta according to package directions.
Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook sausage over medium heat until browned.
Remove sausage from skillet and drain.
Add eggplant to skillet and cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
Add spaghetti sauce and simmer until heated through.
Add ziti or penne macaroni to skillet and toss to coat.
Add sausage and eggplant to pasta mixture.
Add ricotta and pepper and stir until combined.
Pour into a 9x13-inch baking dish.
Top with Parmesan cheese.
Bake for 20 minutes, or until heated through.

594316d1ba.gt:
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
Add rotini pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
Place cooked pasta in a large bowl and combine with sliced baby carrots, broccoli, red onion, cauliflower, green pepper and peppercorn ranch dressing; mix well.
Cover and refrigerate for several hours.
594316d1ba.pred:
In a large pot of boiling water, cook pasta according to package directions.
Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, saute onions, carrots, broccoli, and cauliflower in olive oil until tender.
Add peppercorn Ranch salad dressing and cook until heated through.
Toss pasta with vegetables and dressing.

1c75a448ec.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Combine all ingredients except flour and walnuts in a mixing bowl.
Mix well.
Gradually add flour until well mixed.
Add walnuts.
You can substitute any nut you prefer.
Variation: I have occasionally omitted the nuts for chocolate chips - or used both.
I would almost say they are better than the toll house recipe.
Bake cookies for about 12 minutes on a cookie sheet.
Enjoy!
1c75a448ec.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Combine flour, baking soda, and salt; stir into creamed mixture.
Stir in walnuts.
Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheets for 2 minutes; remove to wire racks to cool completely.

9fe712e539.gt:
For the blueberry sauce: Place blueberries,sugar, vanilla extract, and cinnamon stick in a small saucepan over medium heat.
Cover and mix every couple of minutes.
Once blueberries soften and liquid starts to release from them, add flour and mix together.
Cover again and reduce to low heat.
The sauce will be done once blueberries are softened and you have a slightly thick sauce.
Remove cinnamon stick before spooning onto pancakes.
For the pancakes: Sift together flour, sugar, salt, and baking powder in a medium bowl.
Add almond milk, melted coconut oil, vanilla extract, and mashed banana.
Stir.
Dont worry if there are clumps in your batter, thats normal!
Spray some cooking spray on a preheated griddle or frying pan.
Using a 1/4 cup measuring cup, measure batter and pour onto griddle.
Cook until bubbles start to form and flip pancake.
Cook another minute or two until brown on both sides.
Serve warm with syrup and blueberry sauce!
9fe712e539.pred:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
In a large bowl, combine the flours, sugar, salt, baking powder, and cinnamon.
In a separate bowl, combine the almond milk, coconut oil, vanilla extract, and banana.
Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
Heat a large skillet over medium heat.
Add a small amount of coconut oil to the skillet and cook the pancakes until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with the blueberry sauce.

34e60e4215.gt:
Whisk first 5 ingredients in bowl to blend.
(Can be made 1 day ahead.
Chill.
Bring to room temperature and rewhisk before using.)
Cut off peel and white pith from oranges.
Cut oranges into 1/4- to 1/2-inch-thick rounds.
Cut each round into quarters.
Transfer orange pieces to large bowl.
Add remaining ingredients and toss to combine.
Toss salad with enough dressing to coat and serve.
34e60e4215.pred:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large bowl, whisk together the oil, lemon juice, orange juice concentrate, salt, and pepper.
Add the arugula, pomegranate seeds, and goat cheese; toss to combine.
Spread the salad on a baking sheet and bake until the arugula is wilted, about 10 minutes.
Remove from the oven and let cool slightly.
Toss the salad with the red onion and serve.

0dddf99191.gt:
Trim pork tenderloin removing fat and sinew, slice thinly across the grain (1/4" thickness), place in a bowl.
Add marinade ingredients (soy sauce, white wine, sriracha sauce, honey and ginger), mix to distribute sauce evenly and set aside.
Chop veggies.
Heat wok on high heat for a few minutes, add sesame oil, when oil just starts to smoke, add pork slices, turning frequently.
Stir-fry until pork is mostly cooked and opaque, about 5 - 8 minutes.
Remove pork from wok into a clean bowl/plate, set aside.
In the juices left in the wok, stir in chopped garlic, then add broccoli & carrots.
Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, adding more sesame oil if desired.
Add baby corn and stir-fry for another 1-2 minutes.
Return pork to wok and stir into veggies, add more soy sauce, sriracha, and honey if needed to create a liquid gravy of about 1/2 cup in volume.
Push food to the outer edges so liquid is settled in the bottom of wok.
In a seperate bowl combine cool water & corn starch.
Add mixture to liquid gravy in the wok and stir until thickened.
Mix everything together and voila!
Serve immediately with cooked rice.
(Basmati/wild blend cooked in chicken stock and nutmeg is nice!)
0dddf99191.pred:
In a large skillet, heat sesame oil over medium-high heat.
Add pork and cook until browned on all sides, about 3 minutes.
Remove pork from skillet and set aside.
Add broccoli, carrots, and baby corn to skillet.
Cook until vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes.
Stir in garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Add cornstarch and cool water and stir until thickened.
Return pork to skillet and stir to coat with sauce.
Cook until pork is cooked through, about 3 minutes.
Season with black pepper and serve.

f6c8102a5b.gt: Combine all ingredients in a food processor and process until desired texture is achieved.
f6c8102a5b.pred:
Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth.
Store in a tightly covered container in the refrigerator.

3fff1d1389.gt:
Preheat oven to 375.
Cut a 2-inch pocket in the thickest part of each chicken breast.
In a small bowl combine the Feta and the chopped olives, then stuff 1/2 of mixture into each pocket.
In a nonstick skillet, heat 2 Tbs.
olive oil on medium to high heat.
Season the chicken with pepper and add it to the skillet, cooking 2 minutes on each side or until brown.
Transfer to an oven safe baking dish, drizzled with 1 Tbs.
olive oil and bake for 18 minutes.
In a bowl mix tomato, kosher salt, onion, garlic, basil and parley.
When chicken is 5 minutes from being finished, put the remaining olive oil in the skillet, add tomato mix and heat through.
Serve chicken with tomato mix on top.
3fff1d1389.pred:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
In a large bowl, combine chicken, feta cheese, olives, oil, pepper, tomatoes, onion, garlic, basil, and parsley.
Spread mixture in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Bake for 20 minutes, turning once.
Serve with pita bread or a salad.

13ce606661.gt:
May ajust these seasonings to your own taste !
Grind porkfat and mix with lean pork.
Combine well.
Combine all seasonings and mix with pork.
Mix in well with hands and make a small patty and fry until done, Taste your product and ajust seasonings if needed.
Shape into patties and freeze on cookie sheets until hard.
Store in freezer containers until needed.
I use a slider mold to make patties.
Cook time is time in freezer.
13ce606661.pred:
Mix all ingredients together in a large bowl.
Mix well.
Shape into 1/2-inch thick patties.
Place on a greased grill over medium heat.
Grill 4-5 minutes per side.
Serve with your favorite sauce.

73d8122a4e.gt:
In food processor, mix all ingredients until you have a lumpy paste.
Put in a saucepan (I used a small saucepan and it was perfect).
Bring to boil and let simmer slowly about 15 minutes.
Add salt to taste.
Pour in a jar and let cool.
It's good up to one month in the fridge.
73d8122a4e.pred:
Place the diced red bell pepper, sliced long hot red pepper, and garlic cloves in a food processor.
Process until the pepper and garlic are finely chopped.
Add the vinegar and sugar and process until the mixture is smooth.
Season with salt to taste.
Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator.

415a9b7161.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350F and line a 6-cup muffin pan.
Place the butter in a small saucepan over medium heat and cook until the aroma is nutty and the milk solids start to turn brown on the bottom of the pan, about 5 minutes.
With a spatula, transfer the browned butter into a large mixing bowl.
Add the brown and white sugars, eggs and vanilla to the bowl and mix until combined.
Whisk together the flour, ground hazelnuts, baking powder and salt.
Pour the dry ingredients into the browned butter mixture and mix until fully incorporated.
Gently fold in the raspberries.
Spoon the muffin batter into the paper cups.
Scatter the tops with a few of the cracked hazelnuts, while gently pressing them securely into place.
Bake for 15-18 minutes, until a cake tester inserted in the center comes out clean.
Let the muffins cool briefly in the pan, and then place them on a wire rack to cool.
415a9b7161.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Line 12 muffin cups with paper liners.
In a medium bowl, whisk together the butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, eggs, flour, hazelnuts, baking powder, and salt.
Fold in the raspberries.
Divide the batter evenly among the muffin cups.
Sprinkle each muffin with a few hazelnuts.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
Let cool for 5 minutes before removing from the pan.
Serve warm with raspberries on top.

f12ad1f38c.gt:
1.
Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
2.
Make the cheese mixture: mix the cottage cheese, mozzarella, parmesan, basil, oregano, and lemon pepper seasoning together.
3.
Slice the chicken in half lengthwise to create a pocket.
4.
Fill the chicken with the cheese mixture and place into a greased baking dish.
5.
Brush the tops of the chicken breasts with oil and sprinkle with a bit of salt and pepper.
6.
Bake the chicken for 45-55 minutes, or until cooked through and no longer pink.
7.
The cheese mixture will likely have melted a bit from inside the chicken, but just scoop it up and place on a serving plate.
8.
Top the chicken with pasta sauce of your choice.
I usually make my own sauce, but any favorite sauce will work!
f12ad1f38c.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Place chicken breasts in a baking dish and season with salt and pepper.
In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, mozzarella, Parmesan, basil, oregano, lemon pepper seasoning and olive oil.
Stuff each chicken breast with the cheese mixture.
Bake chicken for 45 minutes or until cooked through.
Serve with pasta sauce.

3d07a1a906.gt:
Halve avocados and remove pit.
Roll limes or heat in microwave for 10 seconds to get juices flowing.
Halve the limes.
Rub the avocado halves gently with 1/2 lime to retard the browning.
Juice limes into small bowl and mix with sugar, chili powder and salt using a fork or small whisk.
Add extra-virgin olive oil in a slow stream while mixing dressing.
Pour dressing into the cavities of avocados, distributing it equally and serve.
Garnish with chives or cilantro as an optional garnish.
3d07a1a906.pred:
In a small bowl, combine the lime juice, sugar, chili powder and salt.
Add the avocadoes to the bowl and mash with a fork.
Stir in the olive oil and chives.
Serve with a sprinkle of cilantro, if desired.

0e781ad046.gt:
Roast a whole butternut pumpkin.
When soft, scoop out the flesh and mash or process before adding a teaspoon of ground cumin, crunchy peanut butter and a splash of chilli sauce to taste.
Add a drizzle of olive oil, and stir well.
Serve in a bowl with crackers or pita bread.
0e781ad046.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Cut pumpkin into 1/2 inch cubes.
Place pumpkin cubes in a 13x9 inch baking dish.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with cumin.
Bake for 45 minutes or until pumpkin is tender.
Remove from oven and set aside to cool.
In a food processor, combine peanut butter, chili sauce, and cumin.
Process until smooth.
Add pumpkin and process until smooth.
Serve warm or chilled.

d99c985b0e.gt:
Combine all ingredients.
except the sesame seeds.
Cover and refrigerate mixture for 15 to 20 minutes.
Add sesame seeds.
(If desired).
mix well.
Serve over salad.
d99c985b0e.pred:
In a small bowl, whisk together the oil, vinegar, sesame oil, lemon juice, seasoned pepper, sugar, and garlic powder.
Add the sesame seeds, if using, and whisk until the dressing is well combined.
Serve over a salad.

e40bcadd25.gt:
(Cake) Preheat oven to 180C.
Grease and line a 20cm round cake tin.
Place butter, chocolate and sugar in a medium sized saucepan.
Cook over low heat, until butter melts and sugar has dissolved.
Sift the plain flour, self raising flour and bicarb into the saucepan.
Add almond meal, sour cream, eggs and vanilla essence.
Mix well and pour into prepared pan and bake for 40-45 minutes.
Cool slightly in the tin before turning onto a cooling rack.
Let the cake cool then ice and decorate it.
Icing: Place chocolate and butter in a heatproof bowl over simmering water.
Cook until chocolate melts.
Remove from heat and continue stirring until mixture thickens to an icing consistency.
Really easy- I didn't even sift the flour and still turns out great.
If I can cook it.... Also a great one to get the kids involved in helping.
e40bcadd25.pred:
Preheat oven to 180C.
Grease and line a 20cm round cake tin.
In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add the eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Stir in the bi-carbonate soda and almond meal.
Add the chocolate and sour cream and mix well.
Pour into the prepared tin and bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes or until a skewer inserted into the centre comes out clean.
Leave in the tin for 5 minutes before turning out onto a wire rack to cool completely.
To make the icing, melt the milk chocolate in a heatproof bowl over a pan of simmering water.
Stir in the butter and vanilla essence and allow to cool slightly.
Spread over the top of the cake and decorate with the chopped chocolate.

3f5aca8d35.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 F.
Beat eggs lightly in med bowl with wire whisk or hand beater.
Beat in flour, milk, and salt just until mixed.
Melt butter in 9 inch pie plate (use a pyrex to maximize puffiness) in oven.
Brush around pie plate to distribute evenly.
Sprinkle brown sugar and ground cinnamon evenly over the melted butter.
Arrange sliced apples over the sugar.
Pour batter over apple.
Bake 30-35 minutes.
Quickly loosen the edge of pancake and turn upside down onto a serving plate.
Serve with powdered sugar and lemon juice on the side.
3f5aca8d35.pred:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
In a large bowl, whisk together the margarine, eggs, flour, milk, salt, brown sugar, and cinnamon.
Pour the batter into a 9-inch pie plate or 10-inch cast iron skillet.
Place the skillet in the oven and bake for 20 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
Remove from the oven and let cool for 5 minutes.
Serve with lemon juice and powdered sugar, if desired.

167bcf0a2a.gt:
FRIED SCRUMBLE EGGS
fried scrumble egg set aside
BAKE BACON
bake bacon on parchment paper at 200 C for 15 minute then set aside
SAUTE SPINACH
with oiled pan quick saute spinach for 1 minute with a dash of salt then set aside
FRIED GARLIC AND SHALLOT
fry garlic and shallot till fragrant then add light soy sauce and off heat then add fried eggs and bacon mix well
top on cooked spinach and serve immediately
167bcf0a2a.pred:
Cook bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp.
Remove bacon from pan and drain on paper towels.
Add 1/2 tbsp light soy sauce to bacon fat in pan.
Add garlic and shallot and cook until soft, about 1 minute.
Add spinach and cook until wilted, about 1 minute.
Remove from heat.
In a large bowl, beat eggs with salt and pepper.
Add eggs to spinach mixture and stir to combine.
Add bacon and stir to combine.
Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium heat.
Add egg mixture and cook until set, about 3 minutes.
Flip and cook until other side is set, about 3 minutes.
Cut into 4 wedges.

fbb3258d67.gt:
In a very large skillet, heat 3 tablespoons of the olive oil.
Season the shrimp with salt and pepper, add to the skillet and cook over moderately high heat until lightly browned, 1 to 2 minutes per side.
Transfer to a plate.
In the same skillet, heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil.
Add the garlic and chiles and cook over moderately low heat, stirring, until softened, about 1 minute.
Add the clam juice and bring to a boil, then simmer over moderate heat until the broth has reduced by one-fourth, about 3 minutes.
Whisk in the butter a few cubes at a time until incorporated.
Add the shrimp and cherry tomatoes, season with salt and pepper and simmer until the shrimp are just cooked through, about 2 minutes longer.
Stir in the lemon juice, cilantro and chives and serve.
fbb3258d67.pred:
In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat.
Add the shrimp and cook until they are pink and opaque, about 2 minutes per side.
Season with salt and pepper.
Remove the shrimp from the skillet and set aside.
Add the garlic and chile peppers to the skillet and cook until the garlic is golden brown, about 1 minute.
Add the clam juice, butter, tomatoes, lemon juice, cilantro, and chives.
Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer until the shrimp are cooked through, about 3 minutes.
Add the shrimp back to the skillet and cook until heated through, about 1 minute.
Serve immediately.

e4e4b2152e.gt:
Heat oven to 400 degrees.
Add 3/4 can water to soup.
Heat.
Mix 3/4 can water with flour.
Stir into soup.
Cook, stirring until it thickens.
Add tuna.
Pour into a baking dish.
Mix Bisquick with milk.
Roll into an 8x10 rectangle.
Spread with cheese and pimiento.
Roll like a jelly roll.
Cut into 12 slices.
Place on the tuna mixture.
Bake for 15 minutes.
e4e4b2152e.pred:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Grease a 9x13 baking dish.
Mix the flour, milk and cheese in a bowl.
Add the tuna, soup, pimiento and mix well.
Pour into the prepared baking dish.
Bake for 20-25 minutes.

dd8991d2f0.gt:
Bring water for noodles to boil in a large pot.
Cook noodles according to instructions on package, then drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil, and then add onion.
Saute onions for 10-15 minutes, over medium-low heat until lightly browned.
Add broccoli and 1/4 cup water.
Cover pan and saute 5 minutes or so until broccoli turns bright green and begins to soften.
Stir in garlic and salt.
Then stir in sesame oil, agave and ume vinegar.
In a small bowl, combine arrowroot and 1 tablespoon water, stirring vigorously to make a paste without any lumps.
Pour the paste over the broccoli and mix quickly and vigorously to loosen any of the mixture that sticks to the bottom of the pan.
Place noodles on individual plates, then top with broccoli mixture.
Garnish with scallions, cilantro and peanuts.
dd8991d2f0.pred:
In a large pot, bring the water to a boil.
Add the mung bean noodles and cook for 3 minutes.
Drain and rinse with cold water.
Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add the onion and broccoli and cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
Add the water, garlic, celtic sea salt, sesame oil, agave nectar, ume vinegar, arrowroot, and water.
Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the noodles and peanuts and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir in the scallions and cilantro and serve immediately.

c1a30da967.gt:
Mix all ingredients except oil and dressing until well blended.
Shape into 8 patties.
Cook patties in hot oil in large frying pan on medium heat 4 to 5 minutes on each side or until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with dressing, if desired.
c1a30da967.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Grease and flour 2 9-inch round cake pans.
In a large bowl, combine the stuffing mix, turkey, celery, mayo, flour, mustard, egg, chipotle pepper, and oil.
Mix well.
Divide the mixture evenly between the 2 prepared pans.
Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the centre comes out clean.
Cool in the pans for 10 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.
For the dressing, combine the dressing, turkey, celery, and mayo in a small bowl.
Spread over the top of each cake.

934deaadde.gt:
Boil chicken, salt& poultry in approximately 2 quarts of water.
Remove chicken and set aside.
Add 3 cups milk (more for a richer flavor), bouillon cubes, and butter to broth.
Bring to almost a boil.
Add water to the flour to make a thin solution and pour in broth.
Stir well, reduce heat, and let simmer to thicken.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Pinch each biscuit to small pieces and put in broth.
Stir often so dumplings won't stick together.
When dumplings begin to sink, they are almost ready.
Pick chicken to small pieces and add to broth.
When dumplings are not gummy to taste, it is ready to eat.
934deaadde.pred:
In a large pot, combine chicken, salt, poultry seasoning, bouillon cubes, and butter.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove chicken from pot and shred.
Return chicken to pot and add milk and flour.
Stir until thickened.
Add biscuits and stir.
Serve with mashed potatoes.

48d0d21f53.gt:
Stir in a mixing glass with ice.
Strain into a cocktail glass.
48d0d21f53.pred:
In a cocktail shaker, combine the rye whiskey, Punt y Mes, and maraschino liqueur.
Shake well with ice and strain into a chilled coupe.

b8a3ed253e.gt:
Mince the carrot, onion, garlic.
I make it with a food processor to save time.
Heat olive oil in a pot.
Add minced carrot, onion and garlic.
Add the ground beef and stir.
After meat is cooked, add the ingredients marked and stir frequently.
Otherwise the sauce may splatter.
Serve the sauce generously over the boiled pasta.
It's best to eat it immediately, but you can freeze it up to a month and enjoy later.
You can also use the sauce to make amazing toast the next morning!
Put the sauce and sliced cheese on bread and toast.
b8a3ed253e.pred:
In a large frying pan, heat oil and saute onion and garlic.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Add carrot, tomatoes, and ketchup.
Add sugar and soup stock cubes.
Simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve over spaghetti.

4d0b6bbf93.gt:
Mix the cut vegetables together in a bowl.
In another bowl, whisk the dressing ingredients together until well blended.
Pour the dressing over the salad and stir well.
Allow to sit covered, in your fridge, for 30-60 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Garnish with roasted peanuts and serve.
4d0b6bbf93.pred:
In a large bowl, combine broccoli, carrot, celery, ginger, lemon juice, soy sauce, vinegar, agave, salt, and peanut butter.
Mix well.
Garnish with peanuts.
Serve immediately.

496db791a3.gt:
In a bowl, stir together the strawberries, sugar, orange juice, and Grand Marnier.
Set aside for 30 minutes to macerate.
Position a rack in the upper third of the oven and preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large bowl, sift together the flour, cocoa, and baking powder.
Whisk in the sugar and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together the egg, cream, butter, and vanilla.
Stir the cream mixture into the flour mixture.
Using a tablespoon, drop 6 to 8 shortcakes onto the prepared baking sheet, spacing the mounds evenly (the shortcakes will expand slightly as they bake).
Bake the shortcakes until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 15 to 18 minutes.
Transfer to a rack and let cool.
To whip the cream: In the bowl of a mixer fitted with the whip attachment, on medium-high speed, beat the cream, sugar, and vanilla to medium-stiff peaks.
Do not overbeat.
To serve, split the shortcakes horizontally.
Top the bottom half with a big spoonful of strawberries (including some of the juices) and a big dollop of whipped cream.
Top with the top layer of shortcake, and spoon some berries over the top.
Top with more whipped cream, drizzle with some of the juices, and serve.
496db791a3.pred:
Chop strawberries and set aside.
In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, cocoa, baking powder, sugar, and salt.
In a large bowl, whisk together egg, whipping cream, butter, vanilla, and liqueur.
Add flour mixture to cream mixture and whisk until just combined.
Fold in strawberries.
Pour batter into 2 greased and floured 8-inch round cake pans.
Bake at 350 degrees for 25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Cool cakes in pans on a wire rack for 10 minutes.
Invert cakes onto rack and cool completely.
In a small bowl, whisk together sugar and orange juice.
Whisk in whipping cream.
Spread over cake layers.
Top with remaining cake layer.
Refrigerate until ready to serve.

3d317eada1.gt:
Prepare berry blue jello according to directions on box.
Pour into 13x9 baking dish and place in the refrigerator.
Allow to chill until firm, about 1 hour.
Prepare lemon flavored gelatin using 1 cup of boiling water.
Beat cream cheese slightly and then add the lemon gelatin mixture.
Beat gelatin and cream cheese until smooth.
Set aside and allow to cool to room temperature.
Once the cream cheese mixture has cooled, fold in the whipped topping until mixed thoroughly.
Pour this mixture over the firmly set bottom layer.
Return to the refrigerator and chill until firm, about 1 hour.
Prepare raspberry jello according to directions on box.
Cool this mixture until room temperature and then pour over the middle cream cheese layer.
Return the 3 layers to the refrigerator and chill until top layer is firm.
Cut into squares to serve.
Top with a little whipped topping and a couple of blueberries, if desired.
3d317eada1.pred:
In a large bowl, combine the berry blue gelatin mix, lemon Jell-O, and cream cheese.
Stir until well blended.
Refrigerate until partially set, about 1 hour.
Fold in the whipped topping.
Refrigerate until set, about 2 hours.
Serve and enjoy!

b379bad205.gt:
Place potato and 3 tbs water in a small bowl.
Cover with plastic wrap, vent and microwave 4 minutes or until tender, stirring once.
Set aside.
Heat a 10" skillet over med-high heat.
Coat pan with cooking spray and add onion.
Cover and cook 10 minutes or until lightly browned, stirring occasionally.
Uncover and cook 10 minutes or until golden brown, stirring frequently.
While onions cook, add 1/3 cup water, 1 Tbs at a time to prevent sticking.
Stir in potato, sage, salt and pepper.
Spoon into bowl and cool.
Combine 1/4 cup cheese, milk, egg whites and eggs in a bowl.
Add egg mixture to potato mixture and stir well.
Preheat broiler.
Pour mixture into skillet coated with cooking spray.
Cook over medium heat for 7 minutes or until bottom of frittata is browned and top is almost set.
Sprinkle remaining cheese on top and broil for 5 minutes or until cheese melts and top is set.
b379bad205.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
In a large skillet, saute the onion in the water until tender.
Add the potato and water and cook until the potato is tender.
Stir in the sage, salt and pepper.
In a medium bowl, combine the egg whites, egg, and skim milk.
Pour the egg mixture over the potato mixture and stir to combine.
Sprinkle 1/2 cup of the cheese over the top.
Bake for 45 minutes or until the top is golden brown.
Sprinkle the remaining cheese over the top and bake for 5 minutes more.
Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.

199261e80a.gt:
Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Grease and flour a 10 inch tube pan.
In a large bowl, cream together the butter and cream cheese until well blended.
Add sugar, and beat until light and fluffy.
Blend in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the coconut extract.
Mix in flour and baking powder until just moistened, then stir in coconut.
Spoon batter into the prepared pan.
Bake for 1 hour and 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until a knife inserted into the cake comes out clean.
Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes before inverting onto a cooling rack.
199261e80a.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Grease and flour a 10-inch tube pan.
Beat butter and cream cheese in a large bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy.
Add sugar and beat until well blended.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Add coconut extract and flour, mixing well.
Add flaked coconut and mix well.
Pour batter into prepared pan.
Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Cool in pan for 10 minutes, then remove from pan and cool completely on a wire rack.

c4c9825372.gt:
Preheat oven to 350.
Oil up the pan.
Chop up some lemons and onions put them in the pan.
You can add foil paper to the pan if you dont want it to stick.
If your shrimp doesnt come deveind do that and add that to the pan.
Now get some salt and pepper add a bit over the shrimp.
(garlic and parsley can be added) Now the cayenne pepper is optional i like my shrimp spicy (:
Stick the shrimp in the oven let cook.
I let cook for 20 mins took it out mixed it added more cayenne pepper squeezed some lemon juice over it then put it back in the oven for about 10 mins.
You can make some pasta and garlic bread as a good side.
While its cooking.
Now take the shrimp out :D
c4c9825372.pred:
In a large skillet, heat olive oil or butter over medium heat.
Add onion and saute until soft and translucent.
Add shrimp and cook until pink and firm.
Add lemon juice and stir to combine.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve with lemon wedges.

1282ffb964.gt:
Cook onion rings as directed on package.
When onions are almost done, grill franks 7 to 9 min.
or until heated through, turning occasionally and adding buns to the grill to toast for the last few minutes.
Spread rolls with barbecue sauce.
Insert each frank through 3 onion rings; place in bun.
Top with cheese.
1282ffb964.pred:
In a large bowl, combine the onion rings, franks, barbecue sauce and cheese.
Mix well.
Divide the mixture into 8 equal portions.
Place 1 onion ring and 1 frank in each hot dog sandwich roll, split.
Serve immediately.

f3d6579000.gt:
Combine milk and mustard in bowl; add cheese.
Microwave, stirring every minute, 2-4 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Serve with desired dippers.
f3d6579000.pred:
In a small bowl, combine the milk and mustard.
Microwave on HIGH 30 seconds.
Stir.
Microwave on HIGH 30 seconds.
Stir.
Microwave on HIGH 30 seconds.
Stir.
Microwave on HIGH 30 seconds.
Stir.
Microwave on HIGH 30 seconds.
Stir.
Microwave on HIGH 30 seconds.
Stir.
Microwave on HIGH 30 seconds.
Stir.
Microwave on HIGH 30 seconds.
Stir.
Microwave on HIGH 30 seconds.
Stir.

Stir.
Microwave on HIGH 30 seconds.
Stir.
Microwave on HIGH 30 seconds.
Stir.

Stir.

Stir.

Stir.

Stir.

Stir.

d6c22c19dd.gt:
Cut your brownies up into square bite size pieces and put a single layer of the brownies in the container you want to use.
It can be single serving or in a big truffle dish.
Whip your cream to stiff peaks and then fold in powder sugar.
Making sure it's combined.
Spoon or put in the whipped cream in pastry bag and put the whipped cream top of the brownies.
Then, drizzle the caramel on top and drizzle the chocolate fudge in a pastry bag or zip lock bag and cutting a end on it and top the brownie sundae with cherry.
Enjoy.
d6c22c19dd.pred:
Mix all ingredients together in a bowl.
Microwave the brownies for 30 seconds.
Place the brownies on a plate.
Top with whipped cream.
Sprinkle with powder sugar.
Add cherries.
Drizzle with caramel ice cream topping.
Enjoy!

b3eb381c7e.gt:
Finely grind almond paste in processor.
Add softened butter, flour, and egg; blend until smooth.
Preheat oven to 400F.
Roll out puff pastry on floured surface to 13x11-inch rectangle.
Fold 3/4 inch of edges over; press to adhere to make 11 1/2x9 1/2-inch rectangle.
Transfer to rimmed baking sheet.
Pierce surface evenly with fork, avoiding folded edges.
Spread almond paste mixture evenly over crust within folded edges.
Arrange pear slices atop filling, overlapping slightly.
Sprinkle with 1 tablespoon sugar.
Bake until crust is deep golden and pears are tender, about 38 minutes.
Cool slightly.
Meanwhile, stir vinegar and remaining 1/4 cup sugar in heavy small saucepan over medium heat until sugar dissolves.
Increase heat; boil until syrup is reduced to 1/4 cup, about 6 minutes.
Place tart on platter.
Drizzle syrup over.
Sprinkle lightly with peppercorns and serve warm.
b3eb381c7e.pred:
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F.
In a food processor, pulse the almond paste until it resembles coarse meal.
Add the butter and pulse until the mixture is crumbly.
Add the flour and pulse until the mixture comes together.
Press the dough into a disk and wrap in plastic.
Refrigerate for 30 minutes.
On a lightly floured surface, roll out the puff pastry to a 12-inch round.
Transfer the dough to a 10-inch tart pan with a removable bottom.
Trim the edges and flute the sides.
Line the pastry with parchment paper and fill with pie weights or dried beans.
Bake for 15 minutes.
Remove the parchment paper and weights and bake for 10 minutes more, until the pastry is golden brown.
Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, combine the sugar and vinegar and bring to a boil.
Cook over moderate heat until the mixture is reduced to 1/2 cup, about 5 minutes.
Strain the mixture through a fine sieve into a bowl and stir in the crushed pink peppercorns.
Remove the crostata from the oven and brush the rim with the vinegar glaze.
Let cool for 10 minutes.
Arrange the pear slices on the crostata and serve.

dde6859b7c.gt:
1.
Brown turkey in a nonstick skillet over medium high heat.
After about 7 minutes, drain the liquid off and return the meat to the pan.
Cook another 3 to 5 minutes or until browned.
Drain and set aside.
2.
Add bell pepper, mushrooms, and onion to the skillet and cook about 3 minutes.
The onions and/or mushrooms should be softened.
Add the garlic and cumin; cook another minute.
3.
Add the turkey back to the veggies, then stir in the BBQ sauce, ketchup, hot sauce, and Worcestershire sauce.
Cook, stirring often, until heated through (about 5 minutes).
4.
Spoon mixture into hollowed out rolls (makes it a bit less messy) and serve with your favorite baked chips!
dde6859b7c.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large skillet, brown turkey, peppers, mushrooms, onions and garlic over medium heat.
Add cumin, BBQ sauce, ketchup, hot sauce and Worcestershire sauce.
Stir until combined.
Place in a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake for 30 minutes or until cheese is melted and turkey is cooked through.
Serve with hard rolls.

7b189a7aea.gt:
Grind cookies in a food processor into fine crumbs; transfer to a large mixing bowl.
Grind pecans in the food processor; add to cookie crumbs.
Stir 1 cup confectioners' sugar, bourbon whiskey, cocoa powder, and corn syrup with the cookies and pecans until the mixture holds together; roll into 3/4-inch balls.
Spread coconut onto a plate and 1/4 cup confectioners' sugar onto a separate plate.
Roll balls in coconut and sugar to coat.
Arrange balls onto a platter, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until hardened, at least 1 hour.
7b189a7aea.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a medium bowl, combine the vanilla wafer cookies, pecans, confectioners' sugar, bourbon whiskey, and cocoa powder.
Roll the mixture into 1-inch balls and place on a parchment-lined baking sheet.
Bake for 10 minutes, or until the balls are set.
Remove from the oven and roll the balls in the confectioners' sugar.
Let cool completely before storing in an airtight container.

2e199b153f.gt:
Place strawberries and sugar in a blender and pulse until pureed; steep for 10 minutes.
Pour cream, milk, vanilla extract, and salt into strawberry mixture; blend until smooth and slightly thickened, 10 to 15 seconds.
Whisk red food color into cream mixture.
Pour strawberry mixture into the container of an ice cream maker and freeze according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Transfer ice cream to a sealable container, cover the ice cream with plastic wrap, seal the container, and freeze, 2 hours to overnight.
Process in an ice cream maker until thick.
Immediately transfer to a sealable container, cover with plastic wrap, cover the bowl with a lid and freeze for 2 hours to overnight.
2e199b153f.pred:
In a small saucepan, combine the strawberries, sugar, cream, milk, vanilla, and salt.
Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly.
Remove from the heat and stir in the food coloring.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
Freeze in an ice cream maker according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Transfer to an airtight container and freeze until firm.
Serve with strawberry sauce.

7f9c7a1b1f.gt:
About one hour before smoking, coat both sides of ribs with a little vegetable oil and sprinkle with Chinese 5 spice.
Set aside at room temperature for 1 hour.
Heat charcoal or gas grill for indirect cooking at 230 to 250 degrees F. Add drained wood chips, if using.
Place the ribs, meaty side down, over a drip pan and cook for 2 hours.
Add about 12 coals to a charcoal grill every 45 minutes or so to maintain the heat.
Remove ribs from grill.
Double-wrap each rack in heavy-duty aluminum foil.
Return wrapped ribs to the grill and cook for 1 1/2 to 2 hours more over indirect heat, until very tender.
Add more coals as needed to maintain temperature for a charcoal grill.
Meanwhile, make the glaze.
Combine all ingredients in small saucepan.
Bring to a boil over medium-high heat; reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes, stirring frequently.
Remove ribs from grill and unwrap.
Place ribs over direct heat on grill and brush with honey red pepper glaze.
Cook for about 5 minutes until the glaze is set.
Turn ribs and repeat with more glaze.
7f9c7a1b1f.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Place ribs in a large roasting pan.
In a small bowl, mix together the Chinese 5-spice powder, soaked wood chips, and 1/4 cup of water.
Pour over the ribs and rub into the meat.
Cover with foil and bake for 1 hour.
Remove foil and continue to bake until the meat is tender, about 1 hour more.
Meanwhile, prepare the glaze.
In a small saucepan, combine the lite soy sauce, clover honey, red jalapeno jelly, apple cider vinegar, onion powder, and minced garlic.
Bring to a boil, stirring to dissolve the sugar.
Remove from heat and set aside.
When the ribs are done, remove them from the oven and brush with the glaze.
Return to the oven and bake for 10 minutes, or until the glaze is bubbling and the meat is glazed.

0524637e4d.gt:
Don't peel the potatoes.
Just wash if needed.
Then cut in to medium dice.
Put in pan with enough water to cover.
Add the amount of salt for your taste.
Bring to the boil.
Cook until tender, but not mushy.
Cool a little.
While the potatoes are cooking mix all the other ingredients for the dressing together in a bowl or jug.
You may want to add more or less milk to the dressing, depending how thick or thin you want to coat the potatoes.
0524637e4d.pred:
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.
Mix well.
Chill for at least 2 hours before serving.

904095d715.gt:
In a 10-inch heavy saute pan, heat 1 ounce of clarified butter over high heat.
